scripts.services:dev: concurrently -n profile,address "npm run profile:dev" "npm run address:dev"
scripts.services:start: concurrently -n profile,address "npm run profile:start" "npm run address:start"
scripts.test:unit: npm run -w services/profile-service test && npm run -w services/address-service test
scripts.test:e2e: npm run -w services/profile-service test:e2e && npm run -w services/address-service test:e2e
scripts.test:cov: npm run -w services/profile-service test:cov && npm run -w services/address-service test:cov
scripts.docker:build:profile: docker compose --project-directory infra -f infra/docker-compose.yml build profile-service
scripts.docker:build:address: docker compose --project-directory infra -f infra/docker-compose.yml build address-service
scripts.docker:up:profile: docker compose --project-directory infra -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d --build db liquibase-profile profile-service
scripts.docker:up:address: docker compose --project-directory infra -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d --build db liquibase-address address-service
scripts.docker:logs:profile: docker compose --project-directory infra -f infra/docker-compose.yml logs -f profile-service
scripts.docker:logs:address: docker compose --project-directory infra -f infra/docker-compose.yml logs -f address-service
